info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:08AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches, with 3 to 7 inches across the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...White Bird Grade and Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Areas of blowing and drifting snow will impact Whitebird Hill Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
